comments.author: Poobah.6254
comments.body: The reason for this is that there are currently blocking bugs in both collections.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: I just went through the discovery queue (haven’t been around for a week-ish) and didn’t see Nevermore or Astralaria. I’m guessing that they haven’t been completed by anyone yet.
